packageMeta.name: purescript-affjax
packageMeta.description: An asynchronous AJAX library built using Aff.

declarations.comments: The effect type for AJAX requests made with Affjax.
declarations.title: AJAX

declarations.comments: The type for Affjax requests.
declarations.title: Affjax

declarations.comments: The type of records that will be received as an Affjax response.
declarations.title: AffjaxResponse

declarations.comments: Type alias for URL strings to aid readability of types.
declarations.title: URL

declarations.comments: Makes a `GET` request to the specified URL.
declarations.title: get

declarations.comments: Makes a `POST` request to the specified URL, sending data.
declarations.title: post

declarations.comments: Makes a `POST` request to the specified URL with the option to send data.
declarations.title: post'

declarations.comments:
Makes a `POST` request to the specified URL, sending data and ignoring the
response.
declarations.title: post_

declarations.comments:
Makes a `POST` request to the specified URL with the option to send data,
and ignores the response.
declarations.title: post_'

declarations.comments: Makes a `PUT` request to the specified URL, sending data.
declarations.title: put

declarations.comments: Makes a `PUT` request to the specified URL with the option to send data.
declarations.title: put'

declarations.comments:
Makes a `PUT` request to the specified URL, sending data and ignoring the
response.
declarations.title: put_

declarations.comments:
Makes a `PUT` request to the specified URL with the option to send data,
and ignores the response.
declarations.title: put_'

declarations.comments: Makes a `DELETE` request to the specified URL.
declarations.title: delete

declarations.comments: Makes a `DELETE` request to the specified URL and ignores the response.
declarations.title: delete_

declarations.comments: Makes a `PATCH` request to the specified URL, sending data.
declarations.title: patch

declarations.comments: Makes a `PATCH` request to the specified URL with the option to send data.
declarations.title: patch'

declarations.comments:
Makes a `PATCH` request to the specified URL, sending data and ignoring the
response.
declarations.title: patch_

declarations.comments:
Makes a `PATCH` request to the specified URL with the option to send data,
and ignores the response.
declarations.title: patch_'

declarations.comments: A sequence of retry delays, in milliseconds.
declarations.title: RetryDelayCurve

declarations.comments: Expresses a policy for retrying Affjax requests with backoff.
declarations.title: RetryPolicy

declarations.comments: A sensible default for retries: no timeout, maximum delay of 30s, initial delay of 0.1s, exponential backoff, and no status code triggers a retry.
declarations.title: defaultRetryPolicy

declarations.comments: Retry a request using a `RetryPolicy`. After the timeout, the last received response is returned; if it was not possible to communicate with the server due to an error, then this is bubbled up.
declarations.title: retry

declarations.comments: Makes an `Affjax` request.
declarations.title: affjax

declarations.comments:
Type representing all content types that be sent via XHR (ArrayBufferView,
Blob, Document, String, FormData).
declarations.title: RequestContent

declarations.comments:
A class for types that can be converted to values that can be sent with
XHR requests. An optional mime-type can be specified for a default
`Content-Type` header.
declarations.title: Requestable

declarations.comments:
Valid response types for an AJAX request. This is used to determine the
`ResponseContent` type for a request. The `a` type variable is a phantom
type used to associate the `ResponseType` with a particular instance of
`Respondable`.
declarations.title: ResponseType

declarations.comments:
Type representing content types that be received from an XHR request
(Blob, Document, JSON, String). An optional mime-type can be specified for
a default `Accept` header.
declarations.title: ResponseContent
